questions.question: Do you feel like we spend enough quality time together?
How do you feel about the way we divide responsibilities at home (or in our relationship)?
Do you think we’ve changed since we first got together? In what ways?
Have you ever felt emotionally neglected or unsupported in our relationship?
Do you ever feel like we’re not as intimate (emotionally or physically) as we used to be?
How do you feel about how we make decisions together, especially when we disagree? Do you think we handle conflict well?
Do you ever feel like you’re settling in this relationship?
Do you think we’re truly compatible, or are we just comfortable with each other?
How would you feel if we were no longer physically intimate (for any reason)?
